channel.title: website on HEMB
channel.description: Recent content in website on HEMB

item.title: Hugo PaperMod setup
item.description: Summary We use the Hugo PaperMod theme. An example website from the author is deployed here with source code on github. Search Debugging When setting up the website, we had a few bugs with PaperMod’s search functionality. There is a small wiki section on search. If you use languages in your config.yaml (or hugo.yaml), make sure you name the search file content/search.en.md. Related post Search calibration and algorithm Current parameters for search:
